title: International Networking for Young Scientists Working on Renewable Energy - China:UK Partnership - Revision 3
abstractText: Reseachers are being brought together at a China:UK Renewable Energy Research Workshop. They will define and initiate joint research and staff/student exchanges between Chinese and UK universities to advance renewable energy and related research to meet the energy needs of both China and the UK.
impactText: This was a networking grant that led to a few relationships between the young scientists that visited China and the researchers that they met. Energy Cultural
findingsText: This was a networking grant, there was no directly funded research This was a networking grant, there was no directly funded research Energy
